name: DR. MELVIN GANAPIN
title: Techical Services Officer, PIC Philippines Inc.
description: Dr. Melvin Ganapin is responsible for overseeing pig health, nutrition, and environment from weaning to market weight, while troubleshooting issues to ensure optimal growth and performance. He is also responsible for the implementation of after sales by providing recommendations and solutions on concerns of delivered animals and performances of external customers.

name: Dr. Rommel C. Sulabo
title: Director, Institute of Animal Science, University of the Philippines Los Banos
description: Dr. Sulabo is a leading animal science scholar in the Philippines, with over 50 published works in ISI and non-ISI journals. He has received multiple awards, including the NAST-DOST Outstanding Young Scientist (2014) and PSAS Distinguished Researcher (2019). Ranked Top 1 in the Philippines for Animal Science by the AD Scientific Index 2022, he continues to drive scientific advancement in the field.

name: DR. ANDRES BULAY
